alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 12:30AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect southwestern Cuyahoga...eastern Medina...southern Summit and east central Lorain Counties Until 130 AM EST.... At 1229 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from Strongsville to 8 miles north of Wadsworth, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Akron, Medina, Parma, Cuyahoga Falls, Strongsville, Brunswick, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Barberton, Green, Wadsworth, North Olmsted, Parma Heights, Broadview Heights, Brook Park, Berea, Middleburg Heights, Brecksville, Norton and Olmsted Falls. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 301, 302, 305, 316, 602, 603, 612, 613, 614, 615, and 604.
